    Liens

    Presentation

    I am on several translation websites looking for offers from agencies. I prefer to focus on projects about IT, sciences (like math, physics, etc...), and news. My rates per hour are to be discussed depending on the kind of the project: its size, how much time I have to finish it, and if the subject is interesting. Sometimes I work with Lisa Bonheme who is a freelancer too and a schoolmate. By the way, I am doing an IT school (at Epitech Lyon), so translation is more an hobby and a passion for the English language than a full-time work for me.

    See my work at freelancer.com

    • Video Translation to French: “It was very nice working with this freelancer. Good quality work. I would work with him again!” - segway
    • Traduisez de l'anglais à français: “He has done the job perfectly and really quickly. Translations have a french-natal sense and he send me back the file 1 day before the deadline. I hope to work with him once again!” - Nicolastrognot
